title: Pixel 4. Is it worth it ?
content:
Hello :)

Greetings to all !

Now, why at all should i buy a pixel 4 if it's just meant for a bigger camera upgrade ? SD 855 is a wiser choice as 855+ is almost applicable for gamers round the corner. Agreed üëç 

But, what about the motion sense feature which gets unlocked even while we're asleep ? Eh üëÄ 

Come on amigo you should've provided a powerful security system alongside the motion sense if this is the case. I mean am I not really speaking something which should be a safer tool for us ?

Coming to the battery life, when there are OEMs who manufacture phones with 4k mAh, why not google after its 3 successful predecessors üôÑ Still going back to the past with 2.7k mAh battery health ?

Why have you left the epic 3.5mm jack yet again this time ':( ? Hopefully expecting it for G 4a :)

Verdict : Request Google to push an upgrade that really acts as a safety measure to us against the motion sensor which wakes up even during sleep. 

Hope Google is updated for the name it owns :-)
